content:
/>
III.ii.2.A.2.e
.
Updating the Contact Information of Service Record Custodians
When ROs discover that contact information in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.E.1
is no longer accurate, they should notify VA Central Office by sending an e-mail to
VAVBAWAS/CO/212
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information on Service Records
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
